ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Question
ygData.msgSnippet: hmmm sounds weird. Try this then, reinstall Direct X 8.1x Sometimes I have seen an issue and reinstalling directx sometimes fixes it or even the Video driver
ygData.messageBody:
hmmm sounds weird.
Try this then, reinstall Direct X 8.1x
Sometimes I have seen an issue and reinstalling
directx sometimes fixes it or even the Video driver
but try direct X first

Let us know

Rob
--- Deidre Choksy <electrum101@...> wrote:
> Hi Rob,
> I have the Luclin expansion. My video card is a
> Voodoo 3 with 64mb of ram
> in it. I'm not sure what's going on! This only
> started happening awhile
> ago... and I haven't changed anything with my
> computer... I even uninstalled
> a bunch of crap to try and make more room...
> *shrugs*
> Sincerely,
> Deidre
>
> >What expansion do you have? Meaning Lucling,
> Trilogy,
> >etc.
> >
> >The reason I ask is if it is Luclin, chances are
> your
> >video memory is not enough for the rendering, not
> the
> >RAM of the system. If you have 500MB of Ram, you
> have
> >plenty to run the game.
> >
> >Do you know what video card you have and how much
> >Video Ram it can handle. For instance, if I run
> >Luclin on my laptop, the people show up
> naked....lol
> >
> >So your symptoms are different but I bet similar in
> >cause.
> >
> >Let us know
> >
> >Rob
> >
> >
> >--- electrum101 <electrum101@...> wrote:
> > > Hey Everybody,
> > > I'm new to the list! I have a general question
> that
> > > hasen't been
> > > answered for a few months now. I'm hoping one of
> you
> > > might know what
> > > the heck is going on! Ok, so this is what's
> > > happening;
> > > Whenever I zone my characters face will
> change!?!?!
> > > I'm thinking it
> > > has something to do with low memory but I have
> about
> > > 500mb of ram.
> > > And I'm not too keen on computers so if there is
> > > another form of
> > > memory that could be lacking please enlighten
> me!
> > > This stupid problem
> > > has coused me to quit playing for awhile. It
> makes
> > > me sooo mad!!!!
> > > Sincerely,
> > > Deidre
> > >
> > >
> >
